item.title: Installation
item.description: In contrast to plugins, TAS-Battle requires a “clientside” mod to enable slow motion in Minecraft. For that reason you need to install this mod yourself. Installing in the vanilla launcher Head over to https://fabricmc.net/use/installer/ Click “Download for Windows”. Open the downloaded file. Select “1.17.1” inder Minecraft version. The loader version should be always kept at the newest Next we need to download the required mods: Fabric API 1.17.1: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/fabric-api/files/3609590 TAS-Battle: https://mgnet.

item.title: Joining the server
item.description: If you followed everything in installation, start Minecraft via the Minecraft-Launcher or MultiMC. The main menu should look like this: You can try your hand at the training maps via “Play TAS Maps” or join the server. On the next screen you will find a preview of all the available gamemodes “Connect to the server” brings you to the lobby.
